parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump pulley can cause loss of power steering ability, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: loss of power steering ability while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design of the exhaust system, where the exhaust is located next to the gas tank, can cause the heat from the exhaust to melt the plastic gas tank and surrounding wires, leading to a dangerous fuel leak.
symptoms: Rattling sound from the exhaust system
compromised heat shield surrounding the muffler

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the loss of all electrical power, leading to a loss of vehicle control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Intermittent loss of all electrical power
and warning lights on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling system can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage and potential accidents.
symptoms: and repeated failures of the cooling system.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Customer Service and Repair Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of dealerships to properly diagnose and repair issues, combined with poor customer service, can lead to frustration and potential safety hazards.
The failure of the brake modular unit can cause the loss of brake function, leading to accidents or loss of control, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: brake pedal travels to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadvertent long brake travel can cause the brake pedal to travel to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Brake pedal travels to the floor

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of multiple systems, including the ABS, engine, transmission, and cooling systems, can cause the vehicle to become unsafe to operate, leading to accidents or breakdowns.

The failure of the front differential can cause the vehicle to lose power and acceleration, leading to a loss of control, especially when driving on the highway, which can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle will not accelerate when the accelerator pedal is depressed
and the vehicle may experience a loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power and acceleration, leading to a loss of control, especially when driving on the highway, which can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle will not accelerate when the accelerator pedal is depressed
and the transmission may slip or hesitate.
